directions: Mix tuna, celery, Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, black olives, green olives, green onion, and cilantro together in a large bowl. Beat olive oil, lime juice, lemon juice, garlic, dill, salt, and pepper together in a separate bowl; drizzle over the tuna mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can water-packed tuna, drained and flaked
title: Mayonnaise-Free Tuna Salad
